details.description: The Cavalta Hotel in Medellin offers a luxurious experience, combining modern design with comfort in a prime city location. Guests can enjoy elegant rooms, stunning views, and excellent service for both business and leisure travelers. The hotel provides convenient access to Medellín’s top attractions and vibrant nightlife.

single.description: Compact single room with a full bed, high-speed Wi-Fi, a small desk, and a flat-screen TV.

double.description: Spacious double room with a queen bed, city view, modern bathroom, and coffee maker.

triple.description: Ideal for families, it has three single beds, a private bathroom and additional space.

suite.description: Luxury suite featuring a king bed, jacuzzi, private balcony, and access to an exclusive lounge

details.description: Sites Hotel in Medellín is a modern and stylish aparthotel located in the peaceful Patio Bonito area of Poblado.
